name: Arrow Hit! v1.0
description:
v1.0

----------------------------CONTROLS----------------------------

[ HOLD SPACE ] to launch arrow.

----------------------Welcome to Arrow Hit!---------------------

The game is simple; launch as many arrows as you can at the planet, but be careful! Don't accidentally hit any other arrows, or you lose one of your precious lives!

Play levels in Game Mode to earn coins and brag to your friends!

Or rush to launch as many arrows as you can in a quick 30 seconds with Time Trial!
